svcproc.title: Injection Pressure Regulator (IPR) Valve
svcproc.para: The IPR valve, a variable position Pulse Width Modulated (PWM) valve, regulates injection control pressure.

The IPR valve is controlled by a ground circuit in the ECM in response to ICP sensor input. Voltage is supplied through the ignition switch. The IPR valve includes a high-pressure relief valve which releases excessive injection control pressure.
The IPR valve is installed in the rear of the high-pressure oil pump on the intake side of the engine.
